titleStmt.title: The beacon flameing with a non obstante: or A justification of the firing of the beacon, by way of animadversion upon the book entituled the beacon's quenched, subscribed by Col. Pride, &c.
titleStmt.author: Cheynell, Francis, 1608-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abraham Miller, and published by the Subscribers of the Beacon set on fire,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Pride Thomas The beacons quenched: or The humble information of divers officers of the Army, and other wel-affected persons, to the Parliament and Common-wealth of England; concerning the Machivilian design of the Presbyterians, now carrying on by the Stationers of London.
Annotations on Thomason copy: "by Dr Chenell of Portsmouth."; "Decemb. 15th.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Subscribers of the Beacon set
